text.div:
MedicationAdministrationCategory

A coded concept describing where the medication administered is expected to occur

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-admin-category defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
inpatient Inpatient Includes administrations in an inpatient or acute care setting
outpatient Outpatient Includes administrations in an outpatient setting (for example, Emergency Department, Outpatient Clinic, Outpatient Surgery, Doctor's office)
community Community Includes administrations by the patient in their home (this would include long term care or nursing homes, hospices, etc)

name: MedicationAdministrationCategory
description: A coded concept describing where the medication administered is expected to occur

concept.definition: Includes administrations in an inpatient or acute care setting
Includes administrations in an outpatient setting (for example, Emergency Department, Outpatient Clinic, Outpatient Surgery, Doctor's office)
Includes administrations by the patient in their home (this would include long term care or nursing homes, hospices, etc)
